EmailTemplate.description: Notify Users when a Service Request has been completed
EmailTemplate.name: Service Request Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS Service Request Complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today()}
Dear {!MUSW__Application2__c.MUSW__Applicant__c},
Your service request {!MUSW__Application2__c.Name}-{!MUSW__Application2__c.MUSW__Type__c} has been completed by the Department of Safety and Professional Services. To view the result of the service request, please log into the eSLA portal and follow the button for ‘My History.’
If you have any questions please contact the agency during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dsps@wisconsin.gov.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
